statements: SELECT * FROM project_metrics;
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date, success_metric, performance_metric FROM project_metrics;
SELECT project_id, success_metric, performance_metric FROM project_metrics WHERE start_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, start_date, success_metric FROM project_metrics WHERE performance_metric > 0.8;
SELECT project_id, end_date, performance_metric FROM project_metrics WHERE success_metric = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date, success_metric, performance_metric FROM project_metrics;
SELECT * FROM project_metrics WHERE success_metric = 'Completed';
SELECT project_id, success_metric, performance_metric FROM project_metrics WHERE performance_metric >= 0.8 ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM project_metrics WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM project_metrics ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%Marketing%';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM projects WHERE project_manager IN ('Alice Smith', 'Bob Johnson');
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'Alice' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM projects JOIN kpis ON projects.project_id = kpis.project_id WHERE kpi_value > 100 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, kpi_name, kpi_value, kpi_date FROM projects JOIN kpis ON projects.project_id = kpis.project_id WHERE kpi_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM kpis WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_type FROM metrics WHERE kpi_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects JOIN kpis ON projects.project_id = kpis.project_id WHERE kpi_value > 100 ORDER BY start_date ASC;

SELECT projects.project_name, metrics.metric_name, metrics.metric_type FROM projects JOIN kpis ON projects.project_id = kpis.project_id JOIN metrics ON kpis.kpi_id = metrics.kpi_id WHERE kpi_value < 50 ORDER BY projects.project_name ASC;

SELECT projects.project_id, projects.project_name, COUNT(DISTINCT kpis.kpi_id) AS num_kpis FROM projects LEFT JOIN kpis ON projects.project_id = kpis.project_id GROUP BY projects.project_id HAVING num_kpis >= 2 ORDER BY num_kpis DESC, projects.project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_metrics;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM project_metrics ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, budget FROM project_metrics WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, team_size FROM project_metrics WHERE team_size < 10 ORDER BY team_size ASC;
SELECT project_name, budget, completion_date FROM project_metrics WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM project_metrics WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, completion_date FROM project_metrics WHERE team_size >= 5 ORDER BY project_name ASC, team_size DESC;

SELECT p.project_name, r.result_value, k.kpi_name FROM project_metrics p JOIN project_results r ON p.project_id = r.project_id JOIN kpi_metrics k ON r.kpi_id = k.kpi_id WHERE r.result_value >= k.target_value ORDER BY r.result_value DESC;
SELECT pt.project_id, pt.team_member_name, pt.role, pm.budget FROM project_team pt JOIN project_metrics pm ON pt.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pt.role = 'Developer' ORDER BY pm.budget ASC;

SELECT pr.result_date, pr.result_value, pm.project_name FROM project_results pr JOIN project_metrics pm ON pr.project_id = pm.project_id WHERE pr.result_value > 1000 ORDER BY pr.result_date DESC, pr.result_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT kpi_name, goal, actual FROM project_kpis;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM project_tasks;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY role DESC;

SELECT project_name, project_tasks.task_name, task_progress.completion_date FROM projects JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id JOIN task_progress ON project_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id;
SELECT kpi_name, goal, actual FROM project_kpis WHERE actual > goal;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM projects JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
